channel.title: Investment Risk on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Investment Risk on FinanClub

item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:70 Chances: Plug Power reported record revenue in its second-quarter results, reaffirming its full-year sales estimate. Despite recent losses and challenges, Plug Power remains one of the most hyped hydrogen stocks with potential. The hydrogen technology company has hydrogen production plants in various states, contributing to its revenue drivers.

item.title: AI
item.description: score:1021 Chances: Shares of AI software company C3.ai (NYSE: AI) experienced a 7% decline after analysts raised concerns about AI stocks being in a potential bubble. C3.ai’s shift to a consumption-based business model for fiscal 2024 may help lower entry barriers for new customers and quickly strike deals.
